line_1: So on they went, her cheerless heart revived
line_2: And much of hope she to herself derived,

line_1: More pleas'd to view our deeds by thee reviv'd,
line_2: This from our martial board deriv'd,

line_1: Which like the Kind returning Spring reviv'd
line_2: Each Good that slept; for tho' it slept it liv'd,

line_1: Turn'd the pursuit, the fainting fight reviv'd,
line_2: Amidst the routed Belgians he arriv'd,

line_1: And Scandals, oft disprov'd, are still reviv'd;
line_2: Falshoods their Credit gain, tho' ill-contriv'd,
